name: Circle of Power
desc:
You create a summoning circle with a radius of 30 feet centered on a target point within range. It has 8 charges. Each time you cast a spell with the Summoning tag while you are within the circle, a number of charges equal to the tier of the spell are consumed to reduce the cost to 0 AP. Once all charges are consumed, the circle fades away.

If you cast a spell that would exceed the number of remaining charges, the circle immediately fades away, and you must pay the original AP cost of the spell.
